016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser;
017
018import java.util.Map;
019import static java.util.Map.entry;
020import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidException;
021import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.Element;
022import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidParsingException;
023import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.Elements;
024import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.ElementTable;
025
026/**
027 * Event handler implementation for the {@link SumFormulaParser}.
028 *
029 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
030 * @author Nils Hoffmann
031 */
032public class SumFormulaParserEventHandler extends BaseParserEventHandler<ElementTable> {
033
034    private Element element;
035    private int count;
036
037    /**
038     * Create a new {@code SumFormulaParserEventHandler} instance.
039     */
040    public SumFormulaParserEventHandler() {
041        try {
042            registeredEvents = Map.ofEntries(
043                    entry("molecule_pre_event", this::resetParser),
044                    entry("element_group_post_event", this::elementGroupPostEvent),
045                    entry("element_pre_event", this::elementPreEvent),
046                    entry("single_element_pre_event", this::singleElementGroupPreEvent),
047                    entry("count_pre_event", this::countPreEvent)
048            );
049        } catch (Exception e) {
050            throw new LipidParsingException("Cannot initialize ShorthandParserEventHandler.");
051        }
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    protected void resetParser(TreeNode node) {
056        content = new ElementTable();
057        element = Element.H;
058        count = 0;
059    }
060
061    private void elementGroupPostEvent(TreeNode node) {
062        content.put(element, content.get(element) + count);
063    }
064
065    private void elementPreEvent(TreeNode node) {
066
067        String parsed_element = node.getText();
068
069        if (Elements.ELEMENT_POSITIONS.containsKey(parsed_element)) {
070            element = Elements.ELEMENT_POSITIONS.get(parsed_element);
071        } else {
072            throw new LipidException("Error: element '" + parsed_element + "' is unknown");
073        }
074    }
075
076    private void singleElementGroupPreEvent(TreeNode node) {
077        String parsed_element = node.getText();
078        if (Elements.ELEMENT_POSITIONS.containsKey(parsed_element)) {
079            element = Elements.ELEMENT_POSITIONS.get(parsed_element);
080            content.put(element, content.get(element) + 1);
081        } else {
082            throw new LipidException("Error: element '" + parsed_element + "' is unknown");
083        }
084    }
085
086    private void countPreEvent(TreeNode node) {
087        count = Integer.valueOf(node.getText());
088    }
089}
